show_name: Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Yuusha no Shou
other_title: Yuki Yuna is a Hero: The Hero Chapter
結城友奈は勇者である -勇者の章-
opening_theme: "Hanakotoba (ハナコトバ)" by Sanshuu Chuugaku Yuusha-bu (讃州中学勇者部) (Haruka Terui, Suzuko Mimori, Yumi Uchida, Tomoyo Kurosawa, Juri Nagatsuma, Kana Hanazawa)
ending_theme: #1: "Hanakotoba (ハナコトバ)" by Sanshuu Chuugaku Yuusha-bu (讃州中学勇者部) (Haruka Terui, Suzuko Mimori, Yumi Uchida, Tomoyo Kurosawa, Juri Nagatsuma, Kana Hanazawa) (ep 1)
#2: "Yuusha-tachi no Lullaby (勇者たちのララバイ)" by Sanshuu Chuugaku Yuusha-bu (讃州中学勇者部) (Haruka Terui, Suzuko Mimori, Yumi Uchida, Tomoyo Kurosawa, Juri Nagatsuma, Kana Hanazawa) (eps 2-5)
#3: "Ukabeta Omoi (浮かべた想い)" by MONACA (ep 6)
